channel.title: spring-framework on JavaIsland
channel.description: Recent content in spring-framework on JavaIsland

item.title: Spring Framework RCE, Early Announcement
item.description: Updates: [15:40 BST] Spring Boot 2.6.6 is available. [14:38 BST] Spring Boot 2.5.12 is available. [14:00 BST] CVE-2022-22965 is published. [13:03 BST] Added section “Misconceptions”. [12:34 BST] Added section “Am I Impacted”. [12:11 BST] Fix minor issue in the workaround for adding disallowedFields . [11:59 BST] Spring Framework versions 5.3.18 and 5.2.20 , which address the vulnerability, are now available. The release process for Spring Boot is in progress. Overview I would like to announce an RCE vulnerability in the Spring Framework that was leaked out ahead of CVE publication.
